abstract: The most-watched American television network is also moving one of its benchmark Monday night comedies, “Two and a Half Men,” to Thursday night.
snippet: The most-watched American television network is also moving one of its benchmark Monday night comedies, “Two and a Half Men,” to Thursday night.
lead_paragraph: 5:00 p.m. | Updated  CBS, the most-watched American television network, will add three dramas and one comedy to its schedule in the fall, it said Thursday morning in advance of its annual presentation to advertisers in New York.

headline.main: CBS, Already Strong on Comedy, Will Add Three Dramas in Fall
